CDIAC.Notes:
The goal of the MODIS ASCII Subset activity is to prepare summaries of selected MODIS Land Products for the community to use for validation of models and remote sensing products and to characterize field sites. The ASCII Subsets are pixel values of land products for a 7-km x 7-km area centered on flux towers or field sites from around the world.

The objective of the MODIS ASCII Subset project is to provide data in support of validation of models or remote sensing products for selected FLUXNET or field sites. The MODIS ASCII Subset project was designed to prepare and distribute selected MODIS products that were reformatted to facilitate use and interpretation in small-scale (<7 km) studies (e.g., validation).

MODIS Contact information: Phone: +1 (865)241-3952 Email: ornldaac@ornl.gov
